item.text: You must keep carefully all these commandments I am giving you today so that you may live, increase in number, and go in and occupy the land that the Lord promised to your ancestors.

<st data-num="02142" class="">Remember</st> the <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="01870" class="">way</st> by <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> <st data-num="03068 0430">he</st><n id="1" /> has <st data-num="01980" class="">brought</st> you <st data-num="02088" class="">these</st> <st data-num="0705" class="">40</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> through the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st> <st data-num="04616" class="">so that</st> he might, by <st data-num="06031" class="">humbling</st> you, <st data-num="05254" class="">test</st> you to <st data-num="03045" class="">see</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">if</st> <st data-num="03824" class="">you have it within you</st> to <st data-num="08104" class="">keep</st> his <st data-num="04687" class="">commandments</st> <st data-num="0518" class="">or</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st>.

So he humbled you by making you hungry and then feeding you with unfamiliar manna. He did this to teach you that humankind cannot live by bread alone, but also by everything that comes from the Lord’s mouth.

Your <st data-num="08071" class="">clothing</st> did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01086 05921">wear out</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">nor</st> did your <st data-num="07272" class="">feet</st> <st data-num="01216" class="">swell</st> all <st data-num="02088" class="">these</st> <st data-num="0705" class="">40</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st>.
Be keenly aware that just as a parent disciplines his child, so the Lord your God disciplines you.

So you must <st data-num="08104" class="">keep</st> <st data-num="03068 0430">his</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04687" class="">commandments</st>, <st data-num="01980" class="">live</st> according to his <st data-num="01870" class="">standards</st>,<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="03372" class="">revere</st> him.
For the Lord your God is bringing you to a good land, a land of brooks, springs, and fountains flowing forth in valleys and hills,

a <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="02406" class="">wheat</st>, <st data-num="08184" class="">barley</st>, <st data-num="01612" class="">vines</st>, <st data-num="08384" class="">fig trees</st>, and <st data-num="07416" class="">pomegranates</st>, of <st data-num="02132 08081">olive</st> <st data-num="02132" class="">trees</st> and <st data-num="01706" class="">honey</st>,

a <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">where</st> you may <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="03899" class="">food</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03808 04544">in plenty</st> and <st data-num="02637" class="">find</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="02637" class="">lack</st> of <st data-num="03605" class="">anything</st>, a <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st> are <st data-num="01270" class="">iron</st><n id="2" /> and from whose <st data-num="02042" class="">hills</st> you can <st data-num="02672" class="">mine</st> <st data-num="05178" class="">copper</st>.
You will eat your fill and then praise the Lord your God because of the good land he has given you.
Be sure you do not forget the Lord your God by not keeping his commandments, ordinances, and statutes that I am giving you today.

<st data-num="06435" class="">When</st> you <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> your <st data-num="07646" class="">fill</st>, when you <st data-num="01129" class="">build</st> and <st data-num="03427" class="">occupy</st> <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">houses</st>,

when your <st data-num="01241" class="">cattle</st> and <st data-num="06629" class="">flocks</st> <st data-num="07235" class="">increase</st>, when you <st data-num="07235" class="">have plenty</st> of <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> and <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>, and when you <st data-num="07235" class="">have abundance</st> of <st data-num="03605" class="">everything</st>,
be sure you do not feel self-important and forget the Lord your God who brought you from the land of Egypt, the place of slavery,

and who <st data-num="01980" class="">brought</st> you through the <st data-num="01419" class="">great</st>, <st data-num="03372" class="">fearful</st> <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st> of <st data-num="08314" class="">venomous</st> <st data-num="05175" class="">serpents</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="06137" class="">scorpions</st>, an <st data-num="06774" class="">arid place</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">with</st> <st data-num="0369" class="">no</st> <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>. He <st data-num="03318" class="">made</st> <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">flow</st><n id="2" /> from a <st data-num="02496" class="">flint</st> <st data-num="06697" class="">rock</st> and

<st data-num="0398" class="">fed</st> you in the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st> with <st data-num="04478" class="">manna</st> (<st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> your <st data-num="01" class="">ancestors</st> had <st data-num="03808" class="">never</st> before <st data-num="03045" class="">known</st>) <st data-num="04616" class="">so that</st> he might by <st data-num="06031" class="">humbling</st> you <st data-num="05254" class="">test</st> you<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0319" class="">eventually</st> <st data-num="03190" class="">bring good</st> to you.

Be careful<n id="1" /> not to <st data-num="0559 03824">say</st>, “My own <st data-num="03581" class="">ability</st> and <st data-num="06108 03027">skill</st><n id="2" /> have <st data-num="06213" class="">gotten</st> me <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="02428" class="">wealth</st>.”
You must remember the Lord your God, for he is the one who gives ability to get wealth; if you do this he will confirm his covenant that he made by oath to your ancestors, even as he has to this day.
Now if you forget the Lord your God at all and follow other gods, worshiping and prostrating yourselves before them, I testify to you today that you will surely be annihilated.
Just like the nations the Lord is about to destroy from your sight, so he will do to you because you would not obey him.
